title: Bacon Ranch Cheese Ball
directions: Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. 2. Mix with mixer until both blocks are combined. 3. Add in ranch dip mix and green onion and mix well. 4. Blend in shredded cheddar and 1/2 cup of the bacon crumbles. 5. Once mixed, using your hands, form into a ball. 6. Roll the ball into the remaining 1/2 cup of bacon crumbles. 7. Refrigerate 1 hour before serving. 8. Serve with pita chips, crackers, or anything that strikes your fancy 9. Enjoy!
ingredients: • 8 oz packages of cream cheese 2, room temp
• 1 package of Hidden Valley Ranch dip mix
2/3 of the package or using 1.5 packages and doubling this recipe
